name: proletariat
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
the class of people who do unskilled jobs in industry and own little or no property: The power of the proletariat had become too formidable. Industrialism had created a proletariat in Russia. Compare
aristocracy
bourgeoisie
More examplesFewer examplesIn the economic field, capitalism is on the offensive against the proletariat.Did the French proletariat of that time come out even once in a political demonstration against the existing system?This metaphor demonstrates the control the bourgeoisie have over the proletariats.

world history the people in a society who do not control production and must work in order to live, or the lowest social and economic group in a society
